changeSet.author: cuenyad

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'plant' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'plate_id' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE plant ADD COLUMN plate_id VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL;

changeSet.author: cuenyad

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'plant' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'well' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE plant ADD COLUMN well VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL;
